goto_create_registry: cssSelector, #RegistryHPMap area[alt='create your registry']||cssSelector, area[alt='create a registry']|| cssSelector, area[alt='create your registry'] || cssSelector, area[alt='create']||xpath,//*[@id='row1_column1' or @class='large-16 columns']/map/area[@alt='create your registry']
goto_find_registry: xpath, //*[@id='link-rail']//a[contains(@href, 'registry/wedding/registrysearch')] || xpath, //*[@id='row1_column1' or @class='large-16 columns']/map/area[@alt='find a couples registry']
goto_registry_manager: linkText, REGISTRY MANAGER||css, area[alt='manage your registry']||xpath,//*[@id='row1_column1' or @class='large-16 columns']/map/area[@alt='manage']
find_box: css, area[alt='find a registry']||xpath,//*[@id='row1_column1' or @class='large-16 columns']/map/area[@alt='find a couples registry']
manage_box: css, area[alt='manage your registry']||xpath,//*[@id='row1_column1' or @class='large-16 columns']/map/area[@alt='manage your registry']
create_box: css, area[alt='create a registry']||xpath,//*[@id='row1_column1' or @class='large-16 columns']/map/area[@alt='create your registry']
find_registry: xpath,//*[@id='row1_column1' or @class='large-16 columns']/map/area[@alt='find a couples registry'] || xpath,//area[@alt='find']
mange_registry: xpath,//*[@id='row1_column1' or @class='large-16 columns']/map/area[@alt='manage your registry'] || xpath,//area[@alt='manage']
